message.body: Ahhhh just got the official invite!! Perfect for valentines day!!
Yayyy!!! Happy Valentine's day to you and john! Any fun plans?
Happy valentines day to you and Dan, my favorite lovebirds! We're doing dinner tomorrow because he has class tonight. How about you guys?
Very nice! We're just getting takeout from Mandalay (the place in silver spring you and I went) and having a chill night in..we're boring! :-)
Yum! Haha I mean we're not doing anything besides dinner so not exciting on our end but it's nice to have a significant other on this day :)
For sure! And such a wonderful one at that! ;-)
Absolutely haha well you two enjoy dinner and sexytime!
